name: Mis(t)ery
description:
Made in bipsi game maker (bitsy clone) for a bitsy game jam with a theme "shipwreck". It's my first attempt to make a game in bitsy-like engine.

Controls:

  •  PC: arrows or WASD to move and interact
  • Mobile: swipe up/down/left/right to move and interact

How to play:

  • listen to people
  • read signs
  • bump into everything interesting

Content Warnings: death, debt, serious illness
